info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 11 at 12:35PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Snow continues to fall mainly over the southern half of Beaverhead, Madison and Gallatin counties this afternoon... At 1230 PM, light snow continues to fall around Big Sky, West Yellowstone and Raynolds Pass. Further west, the snowfall is a bit heavier right over Monida Pass, on Interstate 15. Another band of heavier snowfall will move northward from Idaho into these areas this afternoon through early this evening. Those traveling through this area over the next several hours should be prepared for areas of poor visibility in snowfall, along with snow covered roadways.
